resources.string: Sometimes referred to as earphones, headphones are a hardware output device that either plug into a computer line out or speakers.
The keyboard is he piece of computer hardware used to input text, characters, and other commands into a computer or similar device.
A mouse is a small handheld input device that controls a computer screens cursor or pointer in conjunction with the way it is moved on a flat surface!
Book tickets of any transportation and travel the world!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
